How To Play
1. Select your bet size and confirm by sending Ethereum transaction to the smart contract.
2. Enter a number between 1 and 100 and confirm your bet.
3. Once 10 Players have confirmed their bet, the average of the ten numbers are calculated.
4. The Player who has entered a number closest to the average gets the maximum share (of the total bet collected from 4 Players) and the Player with the number furthest away from the average gets the least share.
5. The share (minus the transaction gas and 10% House fee) is transferred to all the Players.
